code:
---
title: Sequence Diagram - Server Credential Definition Management
config:
  theme: base
---
%% QuantumZero UML palette note: actors/external=#fff7e6/#b45309, system/component=#e0f2fe/#075985, datastore=#ecfccb/#4d7c0f, notes=#fff9c4/#d97706. Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme.
%% Implements: QuantumZero-server/services/admin-api/src/handlers.rs (Infra_RedisCache)
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  actor Admin as Admin User (Infra_EtcdCluster)
  participant API as Admin API
  participant DB as PostgreSQL

  Admin->>API: GET /api/v1/credential-definitions
  activate API
  API->>DB: SELECT credential_definitions ORDER BY created_at DESC
  activate DB
  DB-->>API: credential definition list
  deactivate DB
  API-->>Admin: 200 OK
  deactivate API

  Admin->>API: POST /api/v1/credential-definitions (Infra_WorkerNode)
  activate API
  API->>DB: INSERT credential_definitions (Infra_LoadBalancer)
  activate DB
  DB-->>API: credential definition row
  deactivate DB
  API-->>Admin: 201 Created
  deactivate API
repo_description: The QuantumZero repository hosts the project’s public-facing static website, delivered through Static Pages. This site provides high-level information about the platform, including architectural overv

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Admin API、PostgreSQL是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: GET /api/v1/credential-definitions、SELECT credential_definitions ORDER BY created_at DESC主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 关于GET /api/v1/credential-definitions、SELECT credential_definitions ORDER BY created_at DESC，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: GET /api/v1/credential-definitions、SELECT credential_definitions ORDER BY created_at DESC和另一个方案相比，优势在于...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: INSERT credential_definitions (Infra_LoadBalancer)主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达INSERT credential_definitions (Infra_LoadBalancer)结束。
